content.rendered:
The Exam Industrial Steel Bar Stool is a commercial grade classroom-look stool perfect for industrial themes or those looking for a strong, care-free bar stool.

Held in stock in a black steel frame with an oak veneered seat and backrest. 

Some self assembly may be required.
